subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Packing five new pounds of power in his usual stunning hand speed, Manny Pacquiao captured a title belt in his fourth weight class, stopping David Diaz in the ninth round to claim the World Boxing Council lightweight championship at the Mandalay Bay Events Center in Las Vegas.
